task_description:
# Implement Gantt Timeline Chart

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-71](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-71/implement-gantt-timeline-chart)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Task bars, dependencies - Ref: 18-gantt-timeline.png

patterns.page_component: Use useParams to get projectId from URL, PageHeader for titles, individual MUI imports (Box, Typography), Card components for containers
patterns.styled_components: Use styled() from @mui/material/styles with Emotion, theme parameter available, TypeScript prop typing
patterns.routing: Nested routes under /projects/:projectId, use Outlet in parent component
patterns.types: Define interfaces in separate type files, export from types/index.ts or dedicated files like types/timeline.ts

existing_implementations.description: Found existing page patterns (AreasPage), styled component patterns (Card), routing structure (App.tsx nested routes)

technology_decisions.rationale: Best open-source option with hierarchical tasks, dependencies, milestones, zoom controls, and React 19 compatibility
